title: What band was Eddie Vedder in before Pearl Jam? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to his Wikipedia page, he was in a few different bands: Surf and Destroy, The Butts, Indian Style, and Bad Radio. He also guest vocalized on Temple of the Dog’s album, which is what led to him becoming the lead singer of Pearl Jam. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eddie_Vedder
An outfit called Bad Radio. He first recorded his song “Better Man”, a song he wrote in his youth, with that band. Flashback: Pre-Fame Eddie Vedder Sings 'Better Man' in 1989
